welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Derby, a charming city known for its rich industrial heritage and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights at East Midlands Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
